name: australian-open-data-portals
title: Australian Open Data Portals
description: A list of Australia organisations that publish open data and the portal they publish on
author: ODI Queensland

fields.name: Organisation
fields.title: Organisation
fields.description: The name of an Australia  organisation that is publishing open data

fields.name: URL

fields.name: Portal

fields.name: Region
fields.description: The geographic coverage of the open data portal
